column4: gerhard> I don't really get involved with politics.  Let the old people worry about those things. ;)  I'm only 24.
SrRaven> If you were interested, here's the link for the seagate tool disk.  http://www.seagate.com/support/seatools/
gerhard> I honestly don't get into politics because it splits people.  Just like religion.  You're either one of them, or us.  And that's why I avoid it.
